subject: Rajasthan Culture
question_en: Who is known as the 'Hero of Rajasthan'?
question_hi: राजस्थान के 'हीरो' कौन जाने जाते हैं?
explanation_en: Maharana Pratap is known for his bravery and is considered the 'Hero of Rajasthan'.
explanation_hi: महाराणा प्रताप अपनी बहादुरी के लिए जाने जाते हैं और राजस्थान के 'हीरो' के रूप में जाने जाते हैं।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
question_en: Who was the founder of the city of Udaipur?
question_hi: उदयपुर शहर के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Rana Udai Singh was the founder of the city of Udaipur.
explanation_hi: रणा उदय सिंह उदयपुर शहर के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
question_en: Who is the author of the book 'Rajputana Gazetteer'?
question_hi: पुस्तक 'राजपूताना गजेटियर' के लेखक कौन हैं?
explanation_en: Sir James Tod was the author of the book 'Rajputana Gazetteer'.
explanation_hi: सर जेम्स टॉड पुस्तक 'राजपूताना गजेटियर' के लेखक हैं।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
question_en: Who was the ruler of Mewar during the Battle of Haldighati?
question_hi: हाल्दीघाटी की लड़ाई के दौरान मेवाड़ का शासक कौन था?
explanation_en: Maharana Pratap was the ruler of Mewar during the Battle of Haldighati.
explanation_hi: महाराणा प्रताप हाल्दीघाटी की लड़ाई के दौरान मेवाड़ के शासक थे।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
explanation_en: Man Singh I built the Amer Fort.
explanation_hi: मन सिंह I ने अमेर किला बनवाया।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
question_en: Who was the founder of the city of Jaisalmer?
question_hi: जैसलमेर शहर के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Raja Rawal Jaisal was the founder of the city of Jaisalmer.
explanation_hi: राजा रावल जैसल जैसलमेर शहर के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
explanation_en: Sufi poet Muhammad Jayasi wrote the book 'Padmavat'.
explanation_hi: सूफी कवि मुहम्मद जयसी ने पुस्तक 'पद्मावत' लिखी।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
question_en: Who was the ruler of the kingdom of Marwar during the 16th century?
question_hi: सोलहवीं सदी में मरवाड़ के शासक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Rao Maldeo was the ruler of the kingdom of Marwar during the 16th century.
explanation_hi: राव मलदेव सोलहवीं सदी में मरवाड़ के शासक थे।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
explanation_en: Jodha Rao built the Mehrangarh Fort.
explanation_hi: राव जोधा ने मेहरानगढ़ किला बनवाया।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
question_en: Who was the founder of the city of Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर शहर के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Jai Singh I was the founder of the city of Jaipur.
explanation_hi: जय सिंह I ने जयपुर शहर के संस्थापक थे।
